name: christmas gnome- santa claus
notes:
crochet christmas gnome pattern.
easy crochet gnome pattern for christmas. crochet this adorable gnome for your christmas decorations. it will look fantastic as a centerpiece on your table, you can put it under the christmas tree or on your fireplace mantle.
crochet santa claus gnome will add a festive spirit around your home.

> the free pattern is available on our blog. [click here!][1]

---- sport weight yarn or any yarn you have in your stash with appropriate crochet hook size
---- crochet hook size 2.5 mm
---- poly fiber fill for stuffing
